_meanings:
{@--1@} Dragging after,
drawing along; attraction in 
general.

{@--2@} Summoning or invoking (by
means of spells).

{@--3@} Grammatical 
attraction, application or attraction of
a word in a preceding rule to a 
subsequent rule, word &c.;  
{#nAyamanukarzaRArTaScakAraH#} <ls>Mbh.</ls> on <ls>P. II. 2. 4</ls>; see also
<ls>Sk.</ls> on <ls>P. VI. 1. 127.</ls>
